title: Pickpocket Twitch ward sounds.
body: I heard his voice line every time he placed one. I was his support. Even heard from across map. Unsure if anyone else on team could hear it, as nobody said anything.

replies.body:
Hey DarkRitual -

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating!
There are tons of posts about this. Basically any champ with warding quotes is audible no matter where they are.
This has been happening to me too. Not often, I have heard my Azir place wards from across the map too.
